Get filtered datasets

Source: R/utils.R
GetListDatasets.Rd

Get filtered datasets

GetListDatasets(class, filtered = FALSE)

Examples

foo1 <- GetListDatasets()

foo2 <- GetListDatasets(class='QFeatures', filtered = TRUE)
